title: Mission
heading: We are a people-centric technology company in the web3 era
description: Our mission is to empower people by building decentralized infrastructure that supports a free and open metaverse
empower desc: <0>Empowering our users to <1>take control of their digital dreams</1> and being able to confidently participate in the inevitable future.</0>
open source desc: <0>Creating <1>trust and transparency with 100% open-source software</1> that is always available for peer review and feedback.</0>
adoption desc: <0>Proactively <1>paving the path to mass adoption</1> of web3 technologies and building the tools necessary to simplify the use of this inherently complicated space.</0>
decentralized desc: <0>Single-minded belief in a decentralized future where our users will always have the ability to decide on their choices <1>without the need for bureaucratic structure and rules.</1></0>
community desc: <0>Garnering a culture of constant learning and <1>building a community</1> of users and developers worldwide who share the same vision as us.</0>
innovation desc: <0>Constantly innovating our products and services to meet the ever changing landscape so that <1>users are always equipped to make their choices.</1></0>
